data.title: Orenburg State Medical University (OSMU) Russia 2024
data.meta_description: Admission 2024-25 in Orenburg State Medical University (OSMU) Russia. NEET Eligibility for MBBS Admission Process in Russian Medical College.
data.text:
MBBS in Russia on your mind? Then plan your MBBS at Orenburg State Medical University (OSMU) Russia. It is one of the best medical universities in Russia. Located in the Orenburg city . From the year of its establishment in 1944, OSMU has introduced many medical subjects, there are over 54 subjects scattered across 47 departments. Owing to its wide range of subjects, this medical college in Russia has 300+ professors with an excellent background in their specialisation.

Orenburg State Medical University is accredited and recognised by several health and education bodies like the Ministry of Health of the Russian Federation, the World Health Organisation and the Medical Council of India. Often foreign students choose to study MBBS in Russia at OSMU because it has amazing facilities for every medical purpose whether it is for teaching, research work or even basic activities.

Moreover, the university makes sure students are given intense practical training rather than theory. They have over 18 clinical bases in their in-house hospital. Annually, the OSMU welcomes students from various countries, thus, they have a diverse population within the campus. The standards and requirements presented to higher education institutions ensure that studying MBBS at Orenburg State Medical University adheres to modern standards and requirements.
